definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: pleasing, good (NH id., Hiph.; also deriv.; Ar. t.a0ba, med. y, be pleasant, delightful, delicious, sweet or savoury in taste or odour, be pure and clean, cheerful, happy (Lane); Aram. t.e0b, t.ob, [[טְאֵב]], [[טַב]], [[טַיֵּב]] and esp. deriv. glad, joyful; As. ṭâbu, be good, kind, acceptable, joyful, vigorous Dl:HWB 299)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[טוֹב]] Nu 11:18 + 32 t.; pl. [[טׂבוּ]] Nu 24:5, Ct So 4:10; (Impf. [[יִיטַב]] from [[יׇטַב]]); Inf. abs. [[טוֹב]] Ju Jdg 11:25; cstr. [[טוֹב]] Je 32:39 + 6 t., [[כְּטוֹב]] Ju Jdg 16:25 Qr (Kt [[כי טוב]]); Pt. [[טוֹב]] Ju Jdg 11:25, 1Sa 2:26; (for these forms v. Bö:§ 1133, 4 SS s.v.; Ges recognizes only Pfs. and fewer of them than above. It is often difficult to decide between vb. and adj.);—
be pleasant, delightful, of tents of Jacob Nu 24:5 (JE; poet.); of caresses Ct So 4:10 (sq. [[מִיַּיִן]] comp.)
be glad, joyful [[טוֹב לֵב]] Ju Jdg 16:25 (Qr), 1Sa 25:36, 2Sa 13:28, Es 1:10 (v. [[טוּב]]
of rank, position, claim: [[הֲטוֹב טוֹב אתה מבלק]] Ju Jdg 11:25 art thou really better than Balak?

[[טוֹב לְ]] be well with, good for Nu 11:18 (J), De 5:30, De 15:16, De 19:13, 1Sa 16:16, 1Sa 16:23, 2Sa 14:32, Ps 119:71, Ps 128:2, Je 22:15; so (sc. [[לוֹ]]) Is 3:10 it is well (with him); [[אז טוב]] Je 22:16 (cf. v:Je 22:15); [[טוֹב אֶל־]] 1Sa 20:12 there is good toward David.

definitions.title: 2 b c f
definitions.body: ) Nu 24:1 (J) 2Sa 3:19, 2Sa 3:36, 2Sa 15:26, 2Sa 19:38; [[אִם טוֹב בְּעֵינֵי]] 1Ki 21:2, Je 40:4, Je 40:4, Zec 11:12; later usage is [[אִם טוֹב עַל]] if it seem good unto (so As. ṭâbu eli, be pleasing unto, Dl:HWB 300 a), 1Ch 13:2, Ne 2:5, Ne 2:7, Es 1:19, Es 3:9, Es 5:4, Es 5:8, Es 7:3, Es 8:5, Es 9:13 (cf. [[טוֹב]] adj.).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 2 ms. [[הֱטִיבוֹתָ]] 2Ch 6:8, [[הֱטִיבׂתָ]] 1Ki 8:18, 2Ki 10:30; —do well, act right, sq. [[כִּי]] that 1Ki 8:18 thou didst well, that it was in thine heart = 2Ch 6:8; sq. inf. c. [[לְ]] 2Ki 10:30 thou hast done well in performing what was right in mine eyes.
